participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and focused on mindfulness, Emily enjoys calm activities and cherishes her family.
participant_1.background: I'm not too interested in social media, I'd rather be focusing on my yoga and finding a partner to spend my life with. I'm not wealthy, but I am able to afford my lifestyle. It's great fun. I have a wife and children. I get along with my family, but they don't understand my collection.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, Marcus strives to improve himself while enjoying the little things in life.
participant_2.background: I love the freedom of driving my moped around town. I'm from the streets, but I'm trying to change my ways. Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab. I'm happy to have a close family and met Jimmy Fallon the other day. I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
Hey! It's going well so far. Just got back from riding my moped around town.
That sounds like fun! I'm not much of a biker myself. I prefer to stay closer to the ground.
Yeah, it can be dangerous for sure. But I love the freedom of it. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to practice yoga and go for walks in the park. I also like to collect action figures.
That's cool! I've never tried yoga, but I've heard it's really good for you. I love going for walks in the park too. I have a black lab that loves to come with me.
Oh, I love dogs! I used to have a golden retriever named Buddy. He was the best dog ever.
Aww, I'm sure he was. I love black labs. They're so loyal and loving.
Yeah, they're great dogs. So, what do you do for work?
I'm a web developer. I love my job. It's really creative and challenging.
That sounds like a cool job! I'm a teacher. I love working with kids.
Oh, that's a great job too! I can't imagine teaching, but I'm sure you're great at it.
Thanks! I try my best. So, what's your favorite thing about Toronto?
I love the food! There are so many great restaurants here.
I agree! The food here is amazing. I love trying new restaurants.
Me too! I'm always looking for new places to eat.
So, what are your plans for the rest of the week?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a bike ride or hang out with my friends.
Sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go for a yoga class tomorrow.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've always wanted to try yoga.
You should! It's really good for you
